original_title: ไอ้ไข่ เด็กวัดเจดีย์
overview: From the pure soul of a little boy whom Phra Thutung entrusted to guard the treasures in an abandoned temple to the adventure in the battle of mantra, spells, magic with human friends to protect the treasure from evil hands
tagline: The world's first time broadcasting the sacred legend on the movie screen.
title: Ai Kai, Wat Chedi Boy
